00023 static const unsigned int DictionaryMagicID = 0xef718f77u;
00024 
00025 int progress_bar_darts(size_t current, size_t total) {
00026   return progress_bar("emitting double-array", current, total);
00027 }
00028 
00029 bool Dictionary::open(const char *file,
00030                       const char *mode) {
00031   filename_ = file;
00032   MMAP_OPEN(char, dmmap_, filename_, mode);
00033 
00034   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(dmmap_->size() >= 100)
00035       << "dictionary file is broken: " << file;
00036 
00037   const char *ptr = dmmap_->begin();
00038 
00039   unsigned int dsize;
00040   unsigned int tsize;
00041   unsigned int fsize;
00042   unsigned int magic;
00043   unsigned int dummy;
00044 
00045   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, magic);
00046   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE((magic ^ DictionaryMagicID) == dmmap_->size())
00047       << "dictionary file is broken: " << file;
00048 
00049   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, version_);
00050   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(version_ == DIC_VERSION)
00051       << "incompatible version: " << version_;
00052 
00053   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, type_);
00054   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, lexsize_);
00055   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, lsize_);
00056   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, rsize_);
00057   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, dsize);
00058   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, tsize);
00059   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, fsize);
00060   read_static<unsigned int>(&ptr, dummy);
00061 
00062   charset_ = ptr;
00063   ptr += 32;
00064   da_.set_array(reinterpret_cast<void *>(const_cast<char*>(ptr)));
00065 
00066   ptr += dsize;
00067 
00068   token_ = reinterpret_cast<const Token *>(ptr);
00069   ptr += tsize;
00070 
00071   feature_ = ptr;
00072   ptr += fsize;
00073 
00074   CHECK_CLOSE_FALSE(ptr == dmmap_->end())
00075       << "dictionary file is broken: " << file;
00076 
00077   return true;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void Dictionary::close() {
00081   MMAP_CLOSE(char, dmmap_);
00082 }
00083 
00084 bool Dictionary::compile(const Param &param,
00085                          const std::vector<std::string> &dics,
00086                          const char *matrix_file,
00087                          const char *matrix_bin_file,
00088                          const char *left_id_file,
00089                          const char *right_id_file,
00090                          const char *rewrite_file,
00091                          const char *pos_id_file,
00092                          const char *output) {
00093   Connector matrix;
00094   scoped_ptr<DictionaryRewriter> rewrite(0);
00095   scoped_ptr<POSIDGenerator> posid(0);
00096   scoped_ptr<ContextID> cid(0);
00097   scoped_ptr<Writer> writer(0);
00098   scoped_ptr<StringBuffer> os(0);
00099   Node node;
00100 
00101   std::vector<std::pair<std::string, Token*> > dic;
00102 
00103   size_t offset  = 0;
00104   unsigned int lexsize = 0;
00105   std::string w, feature, ufeature, lfeature, rfeature, fbuf, key;
00106   int lid, rid, cost;
00107 
00108   const std::string from = param.get<std::string>("dictionary-charset");
00109   const std::string to = param.get<std::string>("charset");
00110   const bool wakati = param.get<bool>("wakati");
00111   const int type = param.get<int>("type");
00112   const std::string node_format = param.get<std::string>("node-format");
00113 
00114   // for backward compatibility
00115   std::string config_charset = param.get<std::string>("config-charset");
00116   if (config_charset.empty()) config_charset = from;
00117 
00118   CHECK_DIE(!from.empty()) << "input dictionary charset is empty";
00119   CHECK_DIE(!to.empty())   << "output dictionary charset is empty";
00120 
00121   Iconv iconv;
00122   CHECK_DIE(iconv.open(from.c_str(), to.c_str()))
00123       << "iconv_open() failed with from=" << from << " to=" << to;
00124 
00125   Iconv config_iconv;
00126   CHECK_DIE(config_iconv.open(config_charset.c_str(), from.c_str()))
00127       << "iconv_open() failed with from=" << config_charset << " to=" << from;
00128 
00129   if (!node_format.empty()) {
00130     writer.reset(new Writer);
00131     os.reset(new StringBuffer);
00132     memset(&node, 0, sizeof(node));
00133   }
00134 
00135   if (!matrix.openText(matrix_file) &&
00136       !matrix.open(matrix_bin_file)) {
00137     matrix.set_left_size(1);
00138     matrix.set_right_size(1);
00139   }
00140 
00141   posid.reset(new POSIDGenerator);
00142   posid->open(pos_id_file, &config_iconv);
00143 
00144   std::istringstream iss(UNK_DEF_DEFAULT);
00145 
00146   for (size_t i = 0; i < dics.size(); ++i) {
00147     std::ifstream ifs(dics[i].c_str());
00148     std::istream *is = &ifs;
00149     if (!ifs) {
00150       if (type == MECAB_UNK_DIC) {
00151         std::cerr << dics[i]
00152                   << " is not found. minimum setting is used." << std::endl;
00153         is = &iss;
00154       } else {
00155         CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << dics[i];
00156       }
00157     }
00158 
00159     std::cout << "reading " << dics[i] << " ... ";
00160 
00161     char line[BUF_SIZE];
00162     size_t num = 0;
00163 
00164     while (is->getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00165       char *col[8];
00166       const size_t n = tokenizeCSV(line, col, 5);
00167       CHECK_DIE(n == 5) << "format error: " << line;
00168 
00169       w = col[0];
00170       lid = std::atoi(col[1]);
00171       rid = std::atoi(col[2]);
00172       cost = std::atoi(col[3]);
00173       feature = col[4];
00174       int pid = posid->id(feature.c_str());
00175 
00176       if (lid < 0  || rid < 0) {
00177         if (!rewrite.get()) {
00178           rewrite.reset(new DictionaryRewriter);
00179           rewrite->open(rewrite_file, &config_iconv);
00180         }
00181 
00182         CHECK_DIE(rewrite->rewrite(feature, &ufeature, &lfeature, &rfeature))
00183             << "rewrite failed: " << feature;
00184 
00185         if (!cid.get()) {
00186           cid.reset(new ContextID);
00187           cid->open(left_id_file, right_id_file, &config_iconv);
00188           CHECK_DIE(cid->left_size()  == matrix.left_size() &&
00189                     cid->right_size() == matrix.right_size())
00190               << "Context ID files("
00191               << left_id_file
00192               << " or "
00193               << right_id_file << " may be broken";
00194         }
00195 
00196         lid = cid->lid(lfeature.c_str());
00197         rid = cid->rid(rfeature.c_str());
00198       }
00199 
00200       CHECK_DIE(lid >= 0 && rid >= 0 && matrix.is_valid(lid, rid))
00201           << "invalid ids are found lid=" << lid << " rid=" << rid;
00202 
00203       if (w.empty()) {
00204         std::cerr << "empty word is found, discard this line" << std::endl;
00205         continue;
00206       }
00207 
00208       if (!iconv.convert(&feature)) {
00209         std::cerr << "iconv conversion failed. skip this entry"
00210                   << std::endl;
00211         continue;
00212       }
00213 
00214       if (type != MECAB_UNK_DIC && !iconv.convert(&w)) {
00215         std::cerr << "iconv conversion failed. skip this entry"
00216                   << std::endl;
00217         continue;
00218       }
00219 
00220       if (!node_format.empty()) {
00221         node.surface = w.c_str();
00222         node.feature = feature.c_str();
00223         node.length  = w.size();
00224         node.rlength = w.size();
00225         node.posid   = pid;
00226         node.stat    = MECAB_NOR_NODE;
00227         CHECK_DIE(os.get());
00228         CHECK_DIE(writer.get());
00229         os->clear();
00230         CHECK_DIE(writer->writeNode(&*os,
00231                                     node_format.c_str(),
00232                                     w.c_str(),
00233                                     &node)) <<
00234             "conversion error: " << feature << " with " << node_format;
00235         *os << '\0';
00236         feature = os->str();
00237       }
00238 
00239       key.clear();
00240       if (!wakati) key = feature + '\0';
00241 
00242       Token* token  = new Token;
00243       token->lcAttr = lid;
00244       token->rcAttr = rid;
00245       token->posid  = pid;
00246       token->wcost = cost;
00247       token->feature = offset;
00248       token->compound = 0;
00249       dic.push_back(std::make_pair<std::string, Token*>(w, token));
00250 
00251       // append to output buffer
00252       if (!wakati) fbuf.append(key.data(), key.size());
00253       offset += key.size();
00254 
00255       ++num;
00256       ++lexsize;
00257     }
00258 
00259     std::cout << num << std::endl;
00260   }
00261 
00262   if (wakati) fbuf.append("\0", 1);
00263 
00264   std::sort(dic.begin(), dic.end());
00265 
00266   size_t bsize = 0;
00267   size_t idx = 0;
00268   std::string prev;
00269   std::vector<const char *> str;
00270   std::vector<size_t> len;
00271   std::vector<Darts::DoubleArray::result_type> val;
00272 
00273   for (size_t i = 0; i < dic.size(); ++i) {
00274     if (i != 0 && prev != dic[i].first) {
00275       str.push_back(dic[idx].first.c_str());
00276       len.push_back(dic[idx].first.size());
00277       val.push_back(bsize +(idx << 8));
00278       bsize = 1;
00279       idx = i;
00280     } else {
00281       ++bsize;
00282     }
00283     prev = dic[i].first;
00284   }
00285   str.push_back(dic[idx].first.c_str());
00286   len.push_back(dic[idx].first.size());
00287   val.push_back(bsize +(idx << 8));
00288 
00289   CHECK_DIE(str.size() == len.size());
00290   CHECK_DIE(str.size() == val.size());
00291 
00292   Darts::DoubleArray da;
00293   CHECK_DIE(da.build(str.size(), const_cast<char **>(&str[0]),
00294                      &len[0], &val[0], &progress_bar_darts) == 0)
00295       << "unkown error in building double-array";
00296 
00297   std::string tbuf;
00298   for (size_t i = 0; i < dic.size(); ++i) {
00299     tbuf.append(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(dic[i].second),
00300                 sizeof(Token));
00301     delete dic[i].second;
00302   }
00303   dic.clear();
00304 
00305   // needs to be 8byte(64bit) aligned
00306   while (tbuf.size() % 8 != 0) {
00307     Token dummy;
00308     memset(&dummy, 0, sizeof(Token));
00309     tbuf.append(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(&dummy), sizeof(Token));
00310   }
00311 
00312   unsigned int dummy = 0;
00313   unsigned int lsize = matrix.left_size();
00314   unsigned int rsize = matrix.right_size();
00315   unsigned int dsize = da.unit_size() * da.size();
00316   unsigned int tsize = tbuf.size();
00317   unsigned int fsize = fbuf.size();
00318 
00319   unsigned int version = DIC_VERSION;
00320   char charset[32];
00321   std::fill(charset, charset + sizeof(charset), '\0');
00322   std::strncpy(charset, to.c_str(), 31);
00323 
00324   std::ofstream bofs(output, std::ios::binary|std::ios::out);
00325   CHECK_DIE(bofs) << "permission denied: " << output;
00326 
00327   unsigned int magic = 0;
00328 
00329   // needs to be 64bit aligned
00330   // 10*32 = 64*5
00331   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&magic),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00332   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&version), sizeof(unsigned int));
00333   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&type),    sizeof(unsigned int));
00334   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&lexsize), sizeof(unsigned int));
00335   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&lsize),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00336   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&rsize),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00337   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&dsize),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00338   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&tsize),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00339   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&fsize),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00340   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&dummy),   sizeof(unsigned int));
00341 
00342   // 32 * 8 = 64 * 4
00343   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(charset),  sizeof(charset));
00344 
00345   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(da.array()),
00346              da.unit_size() * da.size());
00347   bofs.write(const_cast<const char *>(tbuf.data()), tbuf.size());
00348   bofs.write(const_cast<const char *>(fbuf.data()), fbuf.size());
00349 
00350   // save magic id
00351   magic = static_cast<unsigned int>(bofs.tellp());
00352   magic ^= DictionaryMagicID;
00353   bofs.seekp(0);
00354   bofs.write(reinterpret_cast<const char *>(&magic), sizeof(unsigned int));
00355 
00356   bofs.close();
00357 
00358   return true;
00359 }
